title: Generative AI-Utilized Collaborative Instructional Design Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A course focused on improving instructional design skills through AI-collaborative learning in smartphone-limited environments, applying iterative feedback structures centered on formative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can generate instructional design drafts with over 80% completeness using generative AI
Learners can perform AI-collaborative instructional design following the 'generation → monitoring → application → evaluation' framework
Learners can critically analyze AI-generated content and reconstruct it according to educational contexts
Learners can improve instructional design quality by over 30% through collaboration with peers and AI
Learners can execute instructional design processes by efficiently utilizing AI tools in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
